Problem: "google-genai SDK not available"
Solution:
  1. Verify venv has it: /mnt/Shared/cs-projects/simply-mcp-py/venv/bin/python \

  echo "GEMINI_API_KEY=your-key-here" > demo/gemini/.env

  export GEMINI_API_KEY="your-key-here"
